title: Monochromatic Color Schemes

metadata.description: Learn about Monochromatic Color Schemes with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Monochromatic color schemes are easy to create because they use only one color.
Monochromatic schemes use different tones from the same angle on the color wheel (
the same hue
).
Monochromatic color schemes are guaranteed to suit each other because they 
all come from the same family.
